title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Course Content Self-awareness, self-management; Developing motivation: collaboration, achievement, conflict management, decision making, team effectiveness; Assertiveness training; Presentation skills; Stress management; Lateral thinking/ creativity; Persuasion/ negotiation skills; Trust building; Coaching and mentoring skills.
